values:
I AM THE EVIL MAHARAJA!! 

Well, let's see...what have we all missed? Um, quite a bit... oO

 My new obsession with Moulin Rouge, my strange problems with meh dad (but that's commen, isn't it?) and all that tamato and cheese.

So what shall I say? Oh, nothing much, as everything I wish to say is better left unsaid. Everything that I wish I could share are things that I can only share with those closest to me. My deepest thoughts and most well hidden secrets are only for ears I truely trust. =^.^= Sorreh, but I don't know who reads this anymore...so my thoughts will remain saved somewhere on my computer....oO If I can find them now x3

So, instead

Read this! A song! x3

On With The Show, Moulin Rouge


Satine:
I was a fool to believe
A fool to believe
It all ends today
Yes it all ends today

Spoken 
Zidler: 
Send Christian away. Only you can save him.
Satine: 
He'll fight for me.
Zidler: 
Yes, unless he believes you don't love him.
Satine:
What?!
Zidler: 
You're a great actress, Satine. Make him believe you don't love him.
Satine:
NO.
Zidler: 
Use your talent to save him! Hurt him. Hurt him to save him. There is no other way. The show must go on, Satine. We're creatures of the underworld. We can't afford to love.

Today's the day
When dreaming ends

Zidler:
Another hero. Another mindless crime.
Behind the curtain, in the pantomime.
On and on
Does anybody know
What we are living for
Whatever happens
We leave it all to chance
Another heartache
Another failed romance
On and on
Does anybody know
What we are living for

The show must go on
The show must go on
Outside the dawn is breaking
On the stage that holds
Our final destiny
The show must go on
The show must go on

Satine:
Inside my heart is breaking
My makeup may be flaking
But my smile still stays on

The show must go on
The show must go on

I'll top the bill
I'll earn the kill
I have to find the will to carry
On with the
On with the
On with the show

On with the SHOW!
On with the SHOW!

The show must
The show must go on

I'm dead tired, trying to finish homework... Chapters 12 - 16 ....>> It's insane... My head hurts and I keep hurting myself...YAY! Other than homework overload/tutoring(useless tutoring) overload and lack of sleep I'm fine ^^ nbsp; Finally  managed to get my dad off my back...until Tuesday...
when he somehow managed to come up with another way to make me feel guilty in his attempt to get me to come to his house. Luckily, I was half dead from homework so I didn't quite catch what he said and felt no guilt for whatever it was. ^^;;
It's really quite sad, really. After all this time he still doesn't believe a word I say. Everything is my fault...still.... <.< >.> It's obnoxious!!
Yeah... >.>
Ramtin molested me twice...and somehow it's my fault...
Yeah! It's my fault for being female, naive and trusting...
His new wife (my stepmom) left him because he accused her son of touching me...and she was accused by  my counselour of being abusive towards me...It's, again, my fault...
>.> I have to take tutoring because I don't understand math....my fault...and I'm lying... his logic is impecable... <.<
And he wonders why I don't want to visit him...hmmm...
Well, everything being my fault helps...and the fact that he's never there anyhow! Either on the phone, internet or out and about with friends...People I should be friends with too...even though they dislike me for ruining my dad's marraige. I'm the tattle tale! Shame on me...I should have kept my mouth shut and let it go...Yeah..riiiiiight...
.............................i can't wait to tell him I'm bi................that'll go over like a ton of bricks.......... Baabaa, I'm bi ::BOOOM:: IT'S ALL YOUR FAULT!! >.>
http://i-smell-bleach.livejournal.com/2586.html

Let's see... Megu came over ^^ We were complete spazzes all night long as my neighbors had sex.. in they're bathroom.... .-. that wasn't a pleasent thing to hear.... I burnt my finger...and I feel like absolute crap. My mom called me 'rude' and I just want to dissapear. .-. I don't know what's up with me at this moment...but I feel pretty down...all I need is some time alone...but my mom seems to dissagree.....Tellin' me to call my dad. My dad...a man who could care less about how I'm feeling...Cause I'm supposed to help him with his problems... >_> Its annoying...I'm expected to help a man that never cared about my problems...I'm only 15...well, I will be 15 soon....It's just not fair... My ears are bleeding again... .-. I wish it would stop...but they're still healing and stuff....oh well... My weekend was a blast! x33 Megu and I rotted our brains in front of the computer....But I have a pounding headache right about now that's slowly ruining the rest of my weekend.... .-. I want to just...become nonexistant(baaaad word..did i even spell it right?) or something... v00t for crappy days ruining my weekend....=_= but.... This is cool ^^ lookie what i got:
The Jester!

What was your job in a past life? (LOTS of results & Anime Pics)

Hello dear cruel cruel world

 I started my period today, so I skipped out on the Billy De Frank meeting... heh, mom stared at my funny

"I dun wanna go...you can't make me..."
oO
lovely moment
yep
I enjoy being stared at as though I sprouted multiple arms and legs and turned a frightening shade of purple

Wait

I get that all the time
so what matter does it make?

NONE!

^^

If you ignore the yaoi pairing that I don't like...it's lovely

And I'm sure everyone has been there...but, but...NOT! my cousin

so blah oO

yah

i make sense

and now I dissapear

-poof-

Fine He can be like that and I'll glomp all the smexay people in the world! x3

I have gotten a bit bored and created a few stories...Megu!! You must read!! You too, Britan!!

Title: Some memories are best forgotten.

Characters: Melody and Lothar, and a few others from Sforzando Unlimited.

Desc.: Melody is now of age to get married, just like she's always wanted to.(Believe me, she wants to...that way no one can take Lothar away...she's possesive okay? XD)Though as she thinks more about it, she becomes more and more afraid of it.

Yea, it sucks...The Desc. at least...It's actually rather cute...Except for my writing skills...>< I thought about it and it sounded cute, so I decided to write it. ^-^;; It's under my comments..GO! GO read and make me feel oddly illiterate....o.O

IT HAS BEEN SOOOOO FRICKEN LONG since i last updated....^-^;;;;

  AnyhooOoooo, what has changed?

Well, my hair turned orange(DAMN YOU HAIR) and my step mom died it for me....it WAS a carmel color when she was done....though over time it turned a reddish brownish color -_-

damn you hair....i just want normal hair...not camillion hair

damn you hair....

um, my mom has a new friend..er...friends?? i don't know, i don't pay much attention.

I was biten by a family friend, Neda...we were arm wrestling and i was winning and she bit me....how mean

so anyhooo

other than that....im pretty normal

wait no

heres odd stuff:

one: I have Urahara under my bed and I feed him carrots and cabages

two: I have Chad in my dresser and I feed him apple-sauce

Yes, I have problems

BUT BLAME COLOREDBLEACH!!!! SHE STARTED IT!!! SHE PUT RENJI IN HER CLOSET WHERE HIS HAIR GETS TANGLED IN THE SHOE RACK!!!

::ahem::

I've calmed

no need to worry

I think

o.O

Question:(to those who will answere) What's a two-way? I heard it in a song...."She wears a two-way, but I'm not quite sure what that means" 

Yes, well

Unlike the singer, I WANT to know

Thank you

and have a nice

life *insert mianicle laugh here*

Nothing happened today, I mean it...>< Absolutely nothing!! But what can I expect from my dad's house?? That's how it's allways been, but now it's slightly different. Now I actually enjoy being with my dad but we never get the chance, now I enjoy talking to him but I can't when my stepmom is around. I feel so uncomforatable(sp? O_o...see? I DO need an english education...>< lol) I mean...Well,

Here's how it goes:

  My dad and my stepmom had gotten in a fight and my dad had to take me to my mom's house(this happened like 3 weeks ago). So, as he was telling me to get my stuff, she continued to yell at him in Parsi. When I went to go say goodbye to her, she yelled in clear english "I hate you!" Now tell me, what kind of a person after hearing that would just go up to their stepmom and act like nothing was said and say good bye??? Well, I didn't!! You can bet on that!!!

  So as we were heading into the car, she comes storming out and yells at me. She was like, "What did I do?? Do you hate me??" 

This left me very baffled, I just asked, "What do you mean??"

And she continued with, "What did I do to make you hate me?? You don't even want to say goodbye to me??? What happened?? Why do you and your dad hate me."

My thoughts consited of, 'um....you were yelling at him, if anything you hate him....' and 'shut up...shut up.....shut up.....shut up....shut up'

But I said nothing, to scared....I'm a wimp...><

My dad stood up for me though and they got in another fight

then she

she

of all things to piss me off
she reached the top one

she hit my dad


ok, it my not have been a harmful hit, a small one on the arm


but still

she hit him
i don't like that at all

And then as we were leaving she called him continuesly.....

So, they expect me to act like nothing happened

Like hell I can do that

Who could???

Whatever

Any suggestions???

Please tell me!!! ><
